name: AMOS Cricket
overview: AMOS Cricket is a cricket simulator that features, among other things, various skill levels that are independently adjustable, preset teams and a team editor. As the editor also works mid-game, one of the features is a built-in cheat engine, should you wish to do so. The game is played from a top-down perspective and requires both mouse and joystick as the batsman is played with the joystick and the bowler with the mouse.
